name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John Lee WHITT, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John Lee WHITT, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Washington County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John C. Pettit, Patrono, Ceisler, Edwards & Pettit, M. Scot Curran, Washington, for appellant.
Herman J. Bigi, Dist. Atty., James H. Brady, Court House, Washington, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
427 A.2d 623
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John Lee WHITT, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Western District.
Argued March 2, 1981.
Decided April 15, 1981.
John C. Pettit, Patrono, Ceisler, Edwards & Pettit, M. Scot Curran, Washington, for appellant.
Herman J. Bigi, Dist. Atty., James H. Brady, Court House, Washington, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
